content:
Hello,
I setup in my zulip server incoming email. It works very well.
But, I would like to manage 'forward address' to have quite more simple address to connect to few streams
example: amoresimpleaddress@myzulipdomain.tld forwarded to zulip+mystream.averylongcode.show-sender@myzulipdomain.tld

My problem is that I use ispconfig to configure forward mails and
zulip+mystream.averylongcode.show-sender@myzulipdomain.tld
is a too large address for ispconfig...
I can't create forward mail !

I though it would be possible to cut manually addresses to reduce a bit : zulip+averylongtext.show-sender@myzulipdomain.tld
But, I don't see how I can do that !
Thank you

I suspect you can do this without much trouble by extending the Postfix configuration.

That said, we do have a redesign of the UI for these that might make it not difficult to add such a feature.
That will merge shortly; so we could write up an issue for extending that panel to support a custom email address feature. Likely won't be a near term priority for the core team.
